      Parameters:
      str - data to be written to file
      file - destination .txt file getting written to

    • removeOrder

      private void removeOrder()
      Event function to remove the selected Order from currentOrders. No action will occur if ListView has no selected item.

      Helper to update the textArea/listView displays in real-time (ideally).
